purpose_text.para: Used by software to set the CLAIM tag bits to 1.
The architecture does not define any functionality for the CLAIM tag bits.

note.para: CLAIM tags are typically used for communication between the debugger and target software.

purpose_text.para: Used in conjunction with the DBGCLAIMCLR_EL1 register.

configuration_text.para: An implementation must include eight CLAIM tag bits.

field_description.para: Writing a 1 to one of these bits sets the corresponding CLAIM tag bit to 1. This is an indirect write to the CLAIM tag bits. A single write operation can set multiple CLAIM tag bits to 1.
Writing 0 to one of these bits has no effect.

ps.name: MRS
MSRregister
